PauseMenuChanges.Description: If true, the pause menu will move all buttons to the right, remove the yellow background, and remove the character portrait.

RunInBackground.Description: If true, the game will continue to play audio when out of focus (Alt-tabbed, Pressing the Windows button, etc).

RankingChallengeMoveTimer.Description: If set to false, the Ranking Challenge timer will remain in the original location. If true, it will use the coordinates set below.

RankingChallengePositionX.Description: Changes the X Position of the Ranking Challenge Timer. Can be adjusted, but 365 is recommended. 0 is default.

RankingChallengePositionY.Description: Changes the Y Position of the Ranking Challenge Timer. Can be adjusted, but 860 is recommended. 0 is default.
